description: Track any shipment using shippo API. Using courier name and tracking number.
instructions:
1- Add your API key like this "
ShippoToken shippo_test_1eb074bf6dd8aead2928ada66798044ecf21387a "

2- Check couriers list https://goshippo.com/docs/reference#carriers
you can add a static carrier or dynamic using a drop-down menu. 

3- Use the tracking API as an action in your workflow.
